title: We Played Concrete Genie! - Kinda Funny Games Impressions E3 2018
description:
"Cool Greg" Loves Concrete Genie

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: what's up guys welcome back to kawan easy 3 2018 coverage i'm jim gettys joined by cool Greg Fanning everybody cool Greg you got to play concrete genie I did on the PlayStation 4 he was so excited about this that he personally asked Greg Miller to get an appointment to play he got to play I don't think I've ever seen anyone happened here playing a video game in my entire life yeah tell me about the experience alright so for those who don't know cuz to my shock there wasn't a line out the door all right so I went in there was like spider-man all that but always focused on concrete hearing genie one person that we knew was playing that was kind of like all right come on guys let's get this get out there right right I guess this little kid gets bullied right he wants to come back take over his town it's you know I think it's like the opposite of mario sunshine ugly town well you mean like me pretty town you're cleaning up yeah ugly town you know we're going good okay but as far as the
